StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateChangeRequestAtachment]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ChangeRequestAtachmentID uniqueiden..er, @ChangeRequestID uniqueiden..er, @Name varchar(100), @UploadDate date.me, @UploadedBy varchar(50), @Data varbinary(max) ) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[CHANGE_REQUEST_ATTACHMENT] WHERE CHANGE_REQUEST_ATTACHMENT_ID = @ChangeRequestAtachmentID) BEGIN UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[CHANGE_REQUEST_ATTACHMENT] SET [CHANGE_REQUEST_ID] = @ChangeRequestID ,[NAME] = @Name ,[UPLOAD_DATE] = @UploadDate ,[UPLOADED_BY] = @UploadedBy ,[DATA] = @Data WHERE CHANGE_REQUEST_ATTACHMENT_ID = @ChangeRequestAtachmentID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CHANGE_REQUEST_ATTACHMENT] ([CHANGE_REQUEST_ATTACHMENT_ID] ,[CHANGE_REQUEST_ID] ,[NAME] ,[UPLOAD_DATE] ,[UPLOADED_BY] ,[DATA]) VALUES (@ChangeRequestAtachmentID ,@ChangeRequestID ,@Name ,@UploadDate ,@UploadedBy ,@Data) END
